actions.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 236 (Roll no. 556).

purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-251 to delay the application of environmental `streamlining' provisions in the bill until the Secretary certifies that there is sufficient funding to reduce the current backlog of authorized Corps projects to less than $20 billion; more than $40 billion in projects have already been authorized using existing environmental review processes, but have yet to receive funding for construction.
